viewoption:activateChineseDescription: This enables word lookup for ancient Chinese texts. Word meanings are from the Digital Dictionary of Buddhism.
viewoption:activatePaliDescription: Analyzes the Pali text and attempts to display the word meaning. Note that this is an aid only, and is not always accurate. Word meanings are from the New Concise Pali English Dictionary.
viewoption:changePaliScriptDescription: This enables you to read the Pali text in various scripts.
viewoption:chineseLookupDictionaryDisabl: The 汉语 lookup dictionary is now disabled.
viewoption:displaysInfo: Displays information such as volume/page references, variant readings, etc.
viewoption:lookupDictionaryEnabled: The {lookupDictionary} lookup dictionary is now enabled.
viewoption:noteDescription: Where available, view comments on the translation and variant readings for root texts.
viewoption:noteSummary: Show notes and variants in segmented texts
viewoption:notesDescription: See translator's notes, variant readings, etc..
viewoption:paliLookupDictionaryDisabled: The Pali lookup dictionary is now disabled.
viewoption:referenceDescription: “Main” displays the primary SuttaCentral references for segmented texts, and all references for other texts. Remaining items are extra Pali editions.
viewoption:scriptChanged: Pali is now shown in {paliScript} script.
viewoption:showHighlightingDescription: Where applicable, highlight the text to show extra details such as variant readings, corrections, structure, etc.
viewoption:textViewDescription: Some texts on SuttaCentral are “segmented”; the original text and translation are approximately matched line by line. For such texts, see both root text and translation.
viewoption:textViewEnabled: {textView}-view is now enabled on applicable texts.
